title: Winslow boy [study extract]
creator_credit: London Film Productions, BFI and Anthony Asquith
brief_description: The early part of the trial scenes, the cross-examinations interspersed with shots of people buying newspapers, the family coping with reporters, etc. Particularly interesting as an example of the adaptation of a stage play to the cinema. Based on the play by Terence Rattigan. Cast includes Robert Donat, Margaret Leighton.
